instructions: 面向Abstract Group攤位，準備出發。
直走經過右手邊的XIMEA、XGRIDS、Connection Lounge，約 3 個攤位。
直走經過左手邊的Odyssey，走至Bria Visual AI Platform前，約 2 個攤位。
走到Bria Visual AI Platform前左轉。
目的地就在前方的 SKY ENGINE AI。

target_info.display_name: SKY ENGINE AI: SKY ENGINE AI

companies.name: SKY ENGINE AI
companies.description:
SKY ENGINE AI is a generative simulation and deep learning platform that produces fully annotated synthetic data and trains AI computer vision algorithms in parallel at scale. The platform is architected to procedurally generate highly balanced imagery data of photorealistic environments and objects and provides advanced domain adaptation algorithms. 

SKY ENGINE AI platform is a tool for developers: Data Scientists, ML/Software Engineers creating computer vision projects in any industry.
companies.categories: 3D Graphics, Aerospace Applications, Artifical Intelligence (AI), Automotive Applications, Digital Imaging, Engineering Application, Imaging, Medical Application, Rendering & Modeling, Simulation
